name: Apolis - St. Louis Market Bag
description:
Produced in collaboration with Apolis (Los Angeles, CA). This 100% golden jute fiber market bag with waterproof lining, natural veg dyed leather straps, and antique nickel rivets is the perfect companion at the grocery store or farmer's market. It also includes an interior pocket. 

Additionally, this handcrafted bag provides sustainable employment and a fair wage for a growing female artisan cooperative in rural Bangladesh.

Available exclusively at East + West.

8" x 13" x 18"

name: J Shoes - Laurel Leather Pump (Storm)
description: The Laurel Cork/Storm Leather Shoes are a modern take on a classic style. A fun pump with a tan leather heel and removable ankle strap. Takes you from the office to evening seamlessly.

name: Billykirk - Schoolboy Satchel
description:
The Billykirk Schoolboy Satchel takes inspiration from the old school satchels and Medic cases from WWII Europe. Leather divider inside separates bag into two separate compartments.  Adjustable shoulder strap with dull nickel silver hanrdware. Hand-burnished and edged. 14" x 5" x 10".

Made in the USA

Available in Black or Brown

name: Herschel Supply Co. - Little America Backpack
description:
The Little America is one of Herschel Supply's bestselling backpacks. Inspired by classic mountaineering style, this bag has a larger volume paired with modern functionality.  Interior features a fleece lined and fully padded laptop compartment that's designed to fit most 15 in. laptops.

20"(H) x 10"(W) x 5"(D)

name: Herschel Supply Co. - Oak Briefcase
description:
The Oak briefcase takes inspiration from outdoor styling. This bag comes complete with full grain leather details an internal organizer and two separate padded fleece lined sleeves that can fit an iPad and up to a 15 in. laptop.

10.25"(H) x 8"(W)

name: Billykirk - Trucker Key Fob
description:
Keep your keys safe with this vintage inspired trucker key fob. Billykirk use a solid brass snap clip and DOT brand snaps. Hand-burnished and edged. US sourced leather. 1 1/8" x 5."

Made in the USA

Available in Brown or Tan

name: Billykirk - Card Case w/ Flap
description:
This loop closure design features heavily in the Billykirk collection and is one of the looks they are most known for. Interior pocket and one outside slot pocket.  Easily holds up to 15 credit cards and some cash. Back slot pocket is convenient for Metro cards. Hand-stitched with heavy waxed cording. Hand-burnished and edged. 3" x 4." US sourced leather.

Made in the USA

Available in Brown or Black

name: Herschel Supply Co. - Heritage MacBook Sleeve (13" & 15")
description:
Fleece lined and fully padded. Sleeve is custom fit for the Apple MacBook.

Available in either 13" or 15" sizes.

name: Herschel Supply Co. - Quarry Backpack
description:
Inspired by vintage mountaineering bags, the Quarry features a workwear inspired bungee cord and one easy access main compartment.  Interior pocket is designed to fit up to a 15 in. laptop.

18"(H) x 11.5"(W) x 5.5"(D)

Available in Navy/Red or Black/Gold

name: Raen - Ryko Sunglasses
description:
Blending style with intellect, the Ryko is constructed and shaped to keep your comfort and style at a steady flow.

Designed with hand-crafted perfection, all RAEN sunglasses are outfitted with Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 lens technology.

SIZING : 52/21-140
• Handcrafted Mazzucchelli Zyl Acetate Frame
• Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 Lens offering 100% UVA/UVB protection
• Shipped with custom sunglass case and sock

name: Raen - Dayton Sunglasses (Polarized)
description:
The prominent, hand-sculpted lines offer a lightweight and relaxed fit with masculine appeal. 

Designed with hand-crafted perfection, all RAEN sunglasses are outfitted with Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 lens technology and offered in a polarized style. 

SIZING : 50/21-140
• Handcrafted Mazzucchelli Zyl Acetate Frame
• Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 Lens offering 100% UVA/UVB protection
• Shipped with custom sunglass case and sock

name: Raen - Savoye Sunglasses
description:
A subtly raised cat brow fused with its slender frame creates superior style that bodes well for the guys and the gals. Individually constructed with zyl acetate and the lens precision of Optics by Carl Zeiss Vision, the Savoye creates a visual statement detailed to perfection. 

Designed with hand-crafted perfection, all RAEN sunglasses are outfitted with Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 lens technology and offered in at least one polarized style. 

SIZING : 55/19-140
• Handcrafted Mazzucchelli Zyl Acetate Frame
• Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 Lens offering 100% UVA/UVB protection
• Shipped with custom sunglass case and sock

name: Raen - Deakin Sunglasses
description:
The Deakin’s vintage style frames, easy contours, and lightweight acetate afford you the style and charm you want, no matter where your travels take you.

Designed with hand-crafted perfection, all RAEN sunglasses are outfitted with Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 lens technology and offered in at least one polarized style. 

SIZING : 56/21-140
• Handcrafted Mazzucchelli Zyl Acetate Frame
• Optics by Carl Zeiss CR-39 Lens offering 100% UVA/UVB protection
• Shipped with custom sunglass case and sock

name: J Shoes - Amarante Canvas Ballerina Pump
description: J Shoes Amarante Blue/White Striped Canvas Ballerina Pumps are a simple ballerina style pump with small details that add a subtle twist. Featuring a contrasting striped canvas upper, front bow detailing with wooden bead embellisments and an embossed rubber sole.

description:

Amount: $100

name: J Shoes - Laurel Leather Pump (Chili)
description: The Laurel Cork/Chili Spice Leather Shoes are a modern take on a classic style. A fun pump with a tan leather heel and removable ankle strap. Takes you from the office to evening seamlessly.

name: Kasil Workshop - Benetar Skinny Jean
description:
One of our most popular washes, the “Hitchhiker” is a stunner. Great wash, whiskering, and cut. Skinny fit.

Wash: Hitchhiker
Rise: 8″/ Opening: 12″/ Inseam: 33″

name: Kasil Workshop - Geek Short (Mint)
description:
The Geek Shorts are absolutely perfect for spring and summer, and even as staples. 
Rise: 9.25″/ Inseam: 3″

Color: Mint Green

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Under Eye Complex
description:
Hydrating eye lotion for men

Size: 1 oz / e 30 ml

Minimizes puffiness, and dark circles as it smoothes and tones the delicate skin around the eyes.

Apply a small amount to the skin around the eye area.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Super Shape SPF 15
description:
Hydrating lotion for men
 
Normal to Dry 
UVA / UVB

Size: 4 oz / e 120 ml

Moisturizes and defends skin from the harmful effects of the sun and environment.

Apply liberally to face and neck area, as needed.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Super Close Shave Formula
description:
Hydrating shave cream for men

Easy Glide
Soothing Formula

Size: 8 oz / e 250 ml

Provides a protective cushion between the skin and razor, for a close shave without redness or irritation. Antiseptic and botanical extracts refresh and soothe skin.

Apply cream to clean, wet skin. Rinse blade often under warm water. Application with badger shave brush recommended.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Skin 1.2.3 Kit
description:
Cleanse, tone and hydrate your skin on a daily basis with a trio of products designed to balance and control excess oil production without drying facial skin.

YOUR KIT INCLUDES
Cleanse (10 oz. Face Wash)
Tone (10 oz. Herbal Mint Toner)
Hydrate (4 oz. Oil Free Moisturizer)

The foundation to good skin care can be found in three easy steps. Men’s skin care made simple by Baxter of California.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Shave 1.2.3 Kit
description:
Conventional wet shaving not only provides the closest shave possible, but nothing beats the luxury or pleasure of lathering up a quality badger brush and shaving in a traditionally masculine way.

YOUR KIT INCLUDES
Super Close Shave Formula (JAR)
After Shave Balm
Baxter Best Badger Shave Brush

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Soft Water Pomade
description:
Styling Clay for men's hair

Light Hold / Enhanced Shine

Size: 2 oz / e 60 ml

“Designed to easily blend into and rinse out of hair, this water-based, firm-hold styling formula enhanced with elastic fibers to define hairstyles, providing dimension and textured separation while supplying all-day control sans stiffness.”

The Baxter pomade series can be mixed and matched to achieve a multitude of hair options solutions.

Applying product to wet hair will provide more of a wet-look finish. Applications to dry hair will give less definition, but more of a matte-natural look.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Cream Pomade
description:
Styling Clay for men's hair

Light Hold / Soft Finish

Size: 2 oz / e 60 ml

“Designed to easily blend into and rinse out of hair, this water-based, firm-hold styling formula enhanced with elastic fibers to define hairstyles, providing dimension and textured separation while supplying all-day control sans stiffness.”

The Baxter pomade series can be mixed and matched to achieve a multitude of hair options solutions.

Applying product to wet hair will provide more of a wet-look finish. Applications to dry hair will give less definition, but more of a matte-natural look.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Clay Pomade
description:
Styling Clay for men's hair

Strong Hold / Matte Finish

Size: 2 oz / e 60 ml

“Designed to easily blend into and rinse out of hair, this water-based, firm-hold styling formula enhanced with elastic fibers to define hairstyles, providing dimension and textured separation while supplying all-day control sans stiffness.”

The Baxter pomade series can be mixed and matched to achieve a multitude of hair options solutions.

Applying product to wet hair will provide more of a wet-look finish. Applications to dry hair will give less definition, but more of a matte-natural look.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Oil Free Moisturizer
description:
Hydrating lotion for men

Normal to Oily skin
Fragrance Free

Size: 4 oz / e 120 ml

Plant-based hydration technology absorbs quickly to restore the skin’s moisture barrier, leaving skin feeling smooth and refreshed with a shine-free matte finish.

Apply liberally to face and neck, as needed.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Invigorating Body Wash: Italian Lime
description:
Hydrating shower gel for men

All Skin Types
Italian Lime and Pomegranate Essence

Size: 10 oz / e 300 ml

Washes away dirt and debris from the body without robbing skin of moisture. Mild cleansers and skin-softening agents keep skin smooth and soft.

Gently massage on to wet skin to create mild foam. Rinse thoroughly.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Facial Scrub
description:
Exfoliating Scrub for men

All Skin Types
Weekly Treatment

Size: 4 oz / e 120 ml

Effectively tones, exfoliates, and promotes cell renewal, improving smoothness and revitalizing the complexion.

Massage onto face and neck in a light, circular motion. Rinse well. Use once or twice per week as needed.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Daily Protein Shampoo
description:
Nutrient enriched shampoo for men

All Hair Types
Mild Mint Scent

Size: 10 oz / e 300 ml

Protein, Coenzyme Q10, and nutrients promote hair strength, body, and manageability. Gentle formula removes buildup, and natural toxins like DHT, a male hormone found to be harmful to the hair's growth cycle.

Apply throughout hair, massaging into the scalp. Rinse thoroughly; repeat if necessary.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Daily Moisturizing Conditioner
description:
Nutrient enriched conditioner for men

All Hair Types
Mild Mint Scent

Size: 10 oz / e 300 ml

Protein-enriched formula restores moisture as it helps rebuild the hair. Botanicals and vitamins promote hair manageability, counteract dryness and add shine.

Massage into cleansed hair. For deeper conditioning, leave in 2 to 3 minutes, then rinse thoroughly.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Daily Face Wash
description:
Mild facial cleanser for men

All Skin Types
Fragrance Free

Size: 10 oz / e 300 ml

Removes excess oil and debris without stripping away vital moisture, leaving skin looking refreshed and smooth.

Gently massage on to wet skin to create mild foam. Rinse thoroughly.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Large Comb
description:
Baxter of California – Grooming Implements. Hand Crafted Swiss Made (TORTOISE)

Large Comb – 7.75” Tortoise

Handcrafted in Switzerland, the Baxter of California combs are produced from high quality cellulose acetate sheets (a natural, modified polymer derived from cotton and tree pulp cellulose). From cutting to polishing, each comb goes through a detailed 12-step process of manufacturing (all done by hand), resulting in smoothly tapered teeth and rounded tips for comfort and care of the hair and scalp.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Pocket Comb
description:
Baxter of California – Grooming Implements. Hand Crafted Swiss Made (TORTOISE)

Pocket Comb – 5.25” Tortoise

Handcrafted in Switzerland, the Baxter of California combs are produced from high quality cellulose acetate sheets (a natural, modified polymer derived from cotton and tree pulp cellulose). From cutting to polishing, each comb goes through a detailed 12-step process of manufacturing (all done by hand), resulting in smoothly tapered teeth and rounded tips for comfort and care of the hair and scalp.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Beard Comb
description:
Baxter of California – Grooming Implements. Hand Crafted Swiss Made (TORTOISE)

Beard Comb – 3.25” Tortoise

Handcrafted in Switzerland, the Baxter of California combs are produced from high quality cellulose acetate sheets (a natural, modified polymer derived from cotton and tree pulp cellulose). From cutting to polishing, each comb goes through a detailed 12-step process of manufacturing (all done by hand), resulting in smoothly tapered teeth and rounded tips for comfort and care of the hair and scalp.

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - After Shave Balm
description:
Post Shave Moisturizer for Men

A therapeutic moisturizing treatment specially formulated to soothe and protect skin from shaving irritation and razor burn. Alcohol Free. Hydrates and nourishes skin as it combats the serious dryness caused by daily shaving. Glycerin and organic silicones combine with soothing aloe and allantoin to renew, calm, and condition skin. Natural healing ingredients such as tea tree oil and cooling menthol further help to reduce shaving irritation.

After shaving, apply a small amount to the face and neck area, massaging in until completely absorbed. Use daily. For optimum results, use with Super Shape SPF 15.

Size: 4 oz / e 120ml

Made in the USA.

name: Baxter of California - Safety Razor
description:
MADE IN GERMANY - Chrome plated traditional safety razor.

This custom Double Edge Safety Razor (aka DE Blade, or Safety Razor), is presented with serious wet shavers in mind. The safety razor was first introduced in the late 18th century as an alternative (and “safer”) to a cut throat blade. “DE” blades are commonly known as the blade your father or grandfather used to use – today, classic style wet shaving is making a resurgence.

The blade is packaged in matte black gift box, accompanied with a pack of starter blades, and an instructional card.

name: Baxter of California - Deodorant
description:
Aluminum Free
Alcohol Free
Sensitive Skin Formula
Citrus - Herbal Musk

Size: 2.65 oz / 75 g

Sensitive skin formula provides odor protection with the added comfort of an aluminum and alcohol free formulation.

Made in the USA.

name: SeaVees - Bayside Sandal
description:
Our 09/65 Bayside Sandal embraces the free-thinking, interdependent values of the 60’s hipster subculture. Uppers are made of garment-dyed brushed canvas and veg-tan leather. Leather lined footbed is wrapped in natural espadrille jute. Features leather outsole. 

Color: Black

name: SeaVees - Baja Slip On (W)
description:
Our 02/64 Baja Slip On is a tribute to the early surf adventurers and is inspired by the simple, utilitarian nature of beachside footwear of the era. The Asphalt color is a combination of mesh and linen. 

Color: Asphalt

name: Life/After/Denim - Petola Tank (Black)
description:
Slim fit tank top with a washed vintage feel that feature a button-closure chest patch pocket.

Color: Black
100% Cotton

name: Life/After/Denim - Slim Fit Chino
description:
Great lightweight slim straight chino.

Color: Coastal Blue

5oz Fine Twill
100% Cotton
Leg Opening: 16 3/4" / Knee: 16 3/4"

name: Life/After/Denim - Willoughby Shirt (Fog)
description:
Short sleeve washed cotton shirt with a button-flap pocket and an interior pocket at the chest.

Color: Fog
100% Cotton

name: Life/After/Denim - Skinny Chino
description:
Color: Canteen

5oz Classic Twill
100% Cotton
Leg Opening: 14 1/2" / Knee: 15 1/2"

name: Alternative Apparel - Berkeley Tote
description:
This do-it-all canvas tote bag features double handles, plus one lobster clasp and one o-ring for main compartment closure. Keep track of all your essentials with two roomy outer pockets.

•	100% Cotton Canvas
•	19\" length x 17\" width 
•	Unisex design

Color: Natural or Black
